tool_description: Writes modified source code content to files with backup options and encoding specifications.

file_path.description: Path where the source code should be written

content.description: The source code content to write to the file

create_backup.description: Whether to create a backup of existing file

error_messages: Permission denied: Check write permissions for the file path.
File exists: File already exists and overwrite is set to false.
Invalid encoding: Specified encoding is not supported.
Backup creation failed: Unable to create backup of existing file.
usage: Provide file_path and content to write. Optionally configure backup creation, encoding, and overwrite behavior.

write_success.description: Whether the file was successfully written

backup_path.description: Path to backup file if created

bytes_written.description: Number of bytes written to the file
